allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Multi-provider support and project rename to MeterAI

- Rename project from Claude Usage Tracker to MeterAI
- Add multi-provider architecture \(Manual, Anthropic, OpenAI\)
- Implement secure API key storage using OS credential manager
- Add provider selection and configuration UI
- Update README with separate sections for users and developers
- Add GitHub Actions for CI and automated releases
- Cross-platform support \(Windows, macOS, Linux\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: correct Rust toolchain action name

Changed dtolnay/rust-action to dtolnay/rust-toolchain \(correct action name\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: add package-lock.json for npm ci

Required for npm ci command and GitHub Actions cache

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
